prompt_infos.name: greetings
prompt_infos.description: Basic greetings from user, eg. Hi, Hello etc.

prompt_infos.name: mulyankan_working
prompt_infos.description: Basic working of mulyankan gpt, eg. how mulyankan gpt works?

prompt_infos.name: event_handling
prompt_infos.description: Effect/Impact of events on market/stocks, eg. Impact of any event on market or stocks, How will the global warming impact the stocks, What do you think of XYZ event?/What is your election prediction?

prompt_infos.name: future_question
prompt_infos.description: Answers any question asked in future tense or asking for a prediction, eg. how market will behave, How will global warming impact?

prompt_infos.name: mid_small_large_cap_back_testing
prompt_infos.description: What is the performance of your Market cap allocation/ back-tested result of your Large : Mid : Small allocation ? What is the outcome if I have listened to your Large : Mid : Small alloation ratio/ view ?

prompt_infos.name: future_performance_market_cap
prompt_infos.description: What will be future performance of Market cap allocation based on system ?

prompt_infos.name: future_performance_debt
prompt_infos.description: What will be future performance of debt? What will be future performance of Fixed income based/Debt Allocation on your guidance ?

prompt_infos.name: market_scenario
prompt_infos.description: Answers question regarding current market outlook/scenario, equity market, current equity scores in a year and broader inference from scores, e.g. How is the market condition? market kesa h? What are the scores?

prompt_infos.name: capital_allocation
prompt_infos.description: Asset Allocation Details. Eg. What should be my capital allocation / Broader Asset allocation based on Current market ?

prompt_infos.name: investment_advice
prompt_infos.description: Investment Advice. Eg. Do I go for lumsum or Staggered investment/stp at current juncture ? Should I invest money in STP now? when the system has last told to STOP STP and go into Equity ?

prompt_infos.name: debt_market_view
prompt_infos.description: Debt Market View, Eg. What is current debt market view/allocation ? Broader View on Indian Debt ?

prompt_infos.name: debt_allocation
prompt_infos.description: Debt allocation, eg. Current debt allocation, What should be specific allocation in Debt ? Where should I put my money in Debt ? What should be my allocation in 10 year gsec bsed on interest rate cycle.

prompt_infos.name: large_cap_allocation
prompt_infos.description: Large cap allocation, Eg. What should be Large cap allocation in overall portfolio ?

prompt_infos.name: small_mid_cap_allocation_current
prompt_infos.description: What should be Mid and Small Cap allocation in current portfolio ?

prompt_infos.name: small_mid_cap_allocation_past
prompt_infos.description: What should be Mid and Small Cap allocation in April 2023 ?

prompt_infos.name: small_mid_large_cap_allocation
prompt_infos.description: What should be specific allocation in Large , Mid and Small cap as per current Score / Give me allocation plan / What % should I maintain in Large , Mid and small ? Give me ideal allocation in all caps - i.e large , mid & small  ? How much should I keep in all 3 ?

prompt_infos.name: equity_decision
prompt_infos.description: Answer question related to equity, Ok tell me what shall I do in Equity ?

prompt_infos.name: equity_debt_decision
prompt_infos.description: What is your view on Equity and debt market of india ? Give me the action plan , what shall I do ?

prompt_infos.name: market_fall_undervalue
prompt_infos.description: Will market fall from here or will rise from here ? When should I increase my equity allocation ? When market are under-valued/Favourable ?

prompt_infos.name: market_up_overvalue
prompt_infos.description: When shall I start reducing / trimming  equity allocation ? When Markets are Over-valued / Un-favourable ? When should I start withdrawing money from my equity?

prompt_infos.name: current_market_value
prompt_infos.description: Right - now markets are Over-valued , Fairly or Under-valued ? Is the market currently overvalued or undervalued?

prompt_infos.name: backtesting_broader_guidance
prompt_infos.description: What is your performance based on broader guidance till now / What is your back-testing result says / What is the outcome if we follow your broader guidance ?

prompt_infos.name: debt_allocation_back_testing
prompt_infos.description: What is the performance of your debt allocation/ back-tested result of your debt allocation ? What is the outcome if I have listened to your debt view ?

prompt_infos.name: mid_small_cap_current_view
prompt_infos.description: What is your current view on Mid and small cap ? / Current action plan for small & midcap as per Mulyankan gpt ? Are midcap / Small cap Overvalued or Under valued or Fairly valued ?

prompt_infos.name: category_selection_under_debt
prompt_infos.description: Which category to select under Debt ? / What category you recommend now in debt ? What was your Debt category selection/recommendation in 2020 June ?

prompt_infos.name: category_selection_under_equity
prompt_infos.description: Which category to select under Equity ? / What category you recommend now in Equity ? What was your Equity category selection/recommendation in 2020 June ?

prompt_infos.name: allocation_reco_no_investor_profile
prompt_infos.description: My Investor Profile is HNI / NO PROFILE / NO GOAL and No Fixed Time horizon. What should be Recommendation / Capital allocation / Asset allocation for him at current juncture.  Where Should I put money for HNI / NO PROFILE / NO GOA AND NO FIXED TIME HORIZON INVESTOR ? What should i do WHO ARE HNI / NO PROFILE / NO GOAL AND NO FIXED TIME HORIZON AT CURRENT MARKET SCENARIO / CONDITION ? What was your allocation recommendation in June 2020 ? I have 50 Lakh rs and my Investor carries NO Profile ? Where should I invest?

prompt_infos.name: aggressive_investor_allocation_reco
prompt_infos.description: My Investor Profile is Aggressive/ have long term horizon. What should be Recommendation / Capital allocation / Asset allocation for him at current juncture.  Where Should I put money for Aggressive investor ? What should i do for aggressive investor AT CURRENT MARKET SCENARIO / CONDITION ?What was your allocation recommendation for Aggressive  in July 2023 ?I have 50 Lakh rs and my Investor carries Aggressive ? Where should I invest?

prompt_infos.name: moderate_investor_allocation_reco
prompt_infos.description: My Investor Profile is Moderate/ Medium term horizon / Moderate Retiree  Looking for Capital withdrawal. What should be Recommendation / Capital allocation / Asset allocation for him at current juncture.  Where Should I put money for Moderate investor ? What should i do for Moderate investor AT CURRENT MARKET SCENARIO / CONDITION ?What was your allocation recommendation for Moderate  in November 2023 ?I have 50 Lakh rs and my Investor carries Moderate/ Moderate Retiree Looking for Caopital withdrawal ? Where should I invest?

prompt_infos.name: conservative_investor_allocation_reco
prompt_infos.description: My Investor Profile is Conservative/ Medium term horizon / Conservative Retiree Looking for Capital withdrawal. What should be Recommendation / Capital allocation / Asset allocation for him at current juncture.  Where Should I put money for Conservative investor ? What should i do for Conservative investor AT CURRENT MARKET SCENARIO / CONDITION ?What was your allocation recommendation for Conservative  in June 2022 ? I have 50 Lakh rs and my Investor carries Conservative/ conservative Retiree  Looking for Caopital withdrawal ? Where should I invest?

prompt_infos.name: style_or_factor_sel_large_cap
prompt_infos.description: Which style / Factor based index to go in Large cap ?

prompt_infos.name: style_or_factor_sel_mid_cap
prompt_infos.description: Which style / Factor based index to go in Large cap ?

prompt_infos.name: style_or_factor_sel_small_cap
prompt_infos.description: Which style / Factor based index to go in Large cap ?

prompt_infos.name: style_or_factor_all_3
prompt_infos.description: what should be my  factor/style capital allocation % in all 3  ? Large cap, mid cap and small cap

prompt_infos.name: performance_style_factor_selection
prompt_infos.description: What is your performance based on  guidance till now for style and factor selection / What is your back-testing result says for Style and factor selection / What is the outcome if we follow your broader guidance on style selection and rotation based o algorithm ?
